IRCC.subject: HRX.IRCC
IRCC.description: Internationally Recognized Certificate of Compliance. Kotka checks from the ABS Clearing House that the entered IRCC number exists and is valid.
IRCC.title: IRCC number

availableForGeneticResearch.subject: HRX.availableForGeneticResearch
availableForGeneticResearch.description: If you choose "Yes, with restrictions", explain the restrictions in the following field "Rights and obligations".
availableForGeneticResearch.title: Is genetic research allowed on the genetic resource(s)?

collectionID.subject: HRX.collectionID
collectionID.description: For statistical purposes. The collection where the transaction is directed to. Record transactions directed to different collections as separate transactions if you use this field.
collectionID.title: Collection

correspondentOrganization.subject: HRX.correspondentOrganization
correspondentOrganization.description: Select the counterparty organisation from a list. If not found on the list, you need to add the new organisation first.
correspondentOrganization.title: Counterparty organization

correspondentPerson.subject: HRX.correspondentPerson
correspondentPerson.description: Name of the counterparty person. If the transaction goes to a private person, write their postal address here.
correspondentPerson.title: Counterparty person/contact info

correspondentResearcher.subject: HRX.correspondentResearcher
correspondentResearcher.description: For outgoing transactions the receiving researcher in the counterparty organisation.
correspondentResearcher.title: Receiving researcher

dueDate.subject: HRX.dueDate
dueDate.description: Date when the loan needs to be returned.
dueDate.title: Due date

geneticResourceAcquisitionCountry.subject: HRX.geneticResourceAcquisitionCountry
geneticResourceAcquisitionCountry.description: Country where the genetic resource or traditional knowledge was acquired from, provider country, country of origin. List of countries in Kotka is based on ISO 3166 Country Codes -standard and may differ from the country list in ABSCH.
geneticResourceAcquisitionCountry.title: Acquisition country

geneticResourceAcquisitionDate.subject: HRX.geneticResourceAcquisitionDate
geneticResourceAcquisitionDate.description: Date when the genetic resource or traditional knowledge was acquired.
geneticResourceAcquisitionDate.title: Acquisition date

geneticResourceDescription.subject: HRX.geneticResourceDescription
geneticResourceDescription.description: Description of the genetic resource or traditional knowledge (possible identifiers, taxa, number of specimens, region etc.). Instruction source EU DECLARE User manual and QA.
geneticResourceDescription.title: Description

geneticResourceRightsAndObligations.subject: HRX.geneticResourceRightsAndObligations
geneticResourceRightsAndObligations.description: Presence or absence of rights and obligations relating to access and benefit sharing, including rights and obligations regarding subsequent applications and commercialization. Instruction source EU DECLARE user manual and QA.
geneticResourceRightsAndObligations.title: Rights and obligations

geneticResourceSource.subject: HRX.geneticResourceSource
geneticResourceSource.description: Person or legal entity from whom the user obtained the genetic resources directly, i.e. the previous actor in the value chain. Often a museum or other organization. If a genetic resource is obtained directly from the provider country, the name of the country should be provided. Instruction source EU DECLARE User manual and QA.
geneticResourceSource.title: Source

geneticResourceType.subject: HRX.geneticResourceType
geneticResourceType.description: Choose the type of the genetic resource for statistical and reporting purposes.
geneticResourceType.title: Type of resource

harmonizedSystemCode.subject: HRX.harmonizedSystemCode
harmonizedSystemCode.description: Harmonized System code for the customs
harmonizedSystemCode.title: HS Code for customs

hasIRCC.subject: HRX.hasIRCC
hasIRCC.description: Whether the resource has an IRCC number or not. If not, more information needs to be filled in.
hasIRCC.title: Do you have IRCC number?

incomingReceived.subject: HRX.incomingReceived
incomingReceived.description: Date when incoming transaction was received.
incomingReceived.title: Date received

incomingReturned.subject: HRX.incomingReturned
incomingReturned.description: Date when the incoming loan was returned to the sender.
incomingReturned.title: Date returned

internalRemarks.subject: HRX.internalRemarks
internalRemarks.description: Private remarks that are shown only in Kotka and not to the counterparty organisation.
internalRemarks.title: Internal remarks

legacyID.subject: HRX.legacyID
legacyID.description: Loan/transaction number used in paper loan catalogs or old software (e.g. Curator)
legacyID.title: Old transaction number

localHandler.subject: HRX.localHandler
localHandler.description: Person handling the transaction at local Kotka institution.
localHandler.title: Handler

localHandlerEmail.subject: HRX.localHandlerEmail
localHandlerEmail.description: Contact email for the person handling the transaction in our museum.
localHandlerEmail.title: Handler email

localPerson.subject: HRX.localPerson
localPerson.description: Person responsible for the transaction in our museum/local Kotka institution.
localPerson.title: Person responsible

localPersonEmail.subject: HRX.localPersonEmail
localPersonEmail.description: Contact email for the person responsible in our museum.
localPersonEmail.title: Person responsible email

localResearcher.subject: HRX.localResearcher
localResearcher.description: For incoming transactions, name of the researcher receiving the loan at our museum/ local Kotka institution.
localResearcher.title: Receiving researcher

material.subject: HRX.material
material.description: Description of the material included in this transaction.
material.title: Material description

numberOfParcels.subject: HRX.numberOfParcels
numberOfParcels.description: In how many parcels was the transaction sent/carried.
numberOfParcels.title: Number of parcels

outgoingReturned.subject: HRX.outgoingReturned
outgoingReturned.description: Date when the outgoing loan was returned to us.
outgoingReturned.title: Outgoing loan returned

outgoingSent.subject: HRX.outgoingSent
outgoingSent.description: When the ougoing transaction was sent out from us.
outgoingSent.title: Outgoing transaction sent

isPartOf.subject: MY.isPartOf
isPartOf.description: Which parent or larger collection this is part of.
isPartOf.title: Is part of

publicRemarks.subject: HRX.publicRemarks
publicRemarks.description: Remarks that are shown to both parties of the transaction on transaction PDFs.
publicRemarks.title: Public remarks

receiptReturned.subject: HRX.receiptReturned
receiptReturned.description: When signed transaction receipt was received (outgoing) or sent (incoming).
receiptReturned.title: Receipt returned

requestReceived.subject: HRX.requestReceived
requestReceived.description: When transaction request was received here.
requestReceived.title: Date requested

resourceImported.subject: HRX.resourceImported
resourceImported.description: Are you importing genetic resources, traditional knowledge associated to genetic resources or both?
resourceImported.title: What are you importing?

status.subject: HRX.status
status.description: Whether the transaction is closed, outstanding, in process or still on loan..
status.title: Transaction status

eventDate.subject: HRX.eventDate
eventDate.description: Date when the transaction event occurred.
eventDate.title: Date

eventHandler.subject: HRX.eventHandler
eventHandler.description: Name of the person who handled the transaction event.
eventHandler.title: Handler

eventNotes.subject: HRX.eventNotes
eventNotes.description: More information about the transactions event. You can e.g. list the specimens included in the event in this field.
eventNotes.title: Notes

eventType.subject: HRX.eventType
eventType.description: Type of the transaction event. Return for e.g. partial returns and addition e.g. for when more specimens are added to the transaction later.
eventType.title: Event type

transportMethod.subject: HRX.transportMethod
transportMethod.description: Means of sending, mail, courier etc.
transportMethod.title: Sent by

type.subject: HRX.type
type.description: What kind of transaction this is.
type.title: Transaction type

underNagoya.subject: HRX.underNagoya
underNagoya.description: Is it e.g. non-human genetic material that is going to be used for genetic research as is defined by the protocol?
underNagoya.title: Does Nagoya protocol apply?

owner.subject: MZ.owner
owner.description: Team or organisation that owns the record and can edit it.
owner.title: Owner of record

publicityRestrictions.subject: MZ.publicityRestrictions
publicityRestrictions.description: PUBLIC: all data can be published; PROTECTED: exact locality is hidden (100*100km square); PRIVATE: most of the data is hidden. Empty value means same as public.
publicityRestrictions.title: Publicity restrictions
